ðŸ“– Summary: Flowblade is a multitrack non-linear video editor for Linux that allows users to compose movies from video, audio, and graphics files. It offers a range of editing tools, image compositing features, and audio/video filters. Flowblade supports various media formats and provides advanced features like media generation, batch encoding, and USB shuttle control.
